name: DiaFruit-puzzle
description:
DiaFruit is a very addictive fruit match game, and a completely new style, you will match one,two,three and more.
The block is falling, swipe your finger and match the fruit in block, or your beautiful scenery will be destroyed.
Fruit juice splashed when block matched, match more will get more.

How to play:
1.Swipe your finger in 9 bubble grids and match the fruit shape in block.
2.3 more boosters will help your to pass the level.
3.Match all falling blocks ,you win the level.

Just download and play it, you will enjoy it and more fun for you to taste.
